Detailed Description

A class for representing a set of sites in an MRF.

Author:
J.L. Mundy
Date:
26 March 2011

Each MRF site has a 4-neighborhood, u l x r d with index (u, l, r, d) ==> (0, 1, 2, 3)

Definition in file sdet_mrf_bp.h.
